SELECT type drilldown,(SELECT name FROM t_classification a WHERE x.type = a.id) name,SUM(1) y FROM( SELECT c.`name`,IFNULL(c.parent_id,c.id) type FROM document_readdocument_extend a,document_info b,t_classification c WHERE a.document_id = b.id AND b.category_id = c.id AND handel_type = 2 AND handel_type = 1
AND TO_DAYS(a.time) > TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(a.time) < TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
) x GROUP BY type

SELECT type,SUM(1) sum,x.name FROM( SELECT c.`name`,IFNULL(c.parent_id,c.id) type,c.id FROM document_readdocument_extend a,document_info b,t_classification c WHERE a.document_id = b.id AND b.category_id = c.id AND handel_type = 2 AND handel_type = 1
AND TO_DAYS(a.time) > TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(a.time) < TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
) x GROUP BY x.id

SELECT a.name typeName,IFNULL(a.parent_id,a.id) mainId,a.id classId,b.id document_id,b.file_name, b.read_total,b.collect_total,b.down_total,(b.read_total+b.collect_total+b.down_total) total, IFNULL(d.ckNumber,0) ckNumber,IFNULL(f.xzNumber,0) xzNumber,IFNULL(h.scNumber,0) scNumber, (IFNULL(d.ckNumber,0)+IFNULL(f.xzNumber,0)+IFNULL(h.scNumber,0)) nowTotal,b.upload_user_name userName FROM t_classification a , document_info b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.document_id,COUNT(1) ckNumber,c.time FROM document_read c GROUP BY c.document_id) d ON b.id = d.document_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.document_id,COUNT(1) xzNumber,e.time FROM document_extend e WHERE e.handel_type = 1 GROUP BY e.document_id) f ON b.id = f.document_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT g.document_id,COUNT(1) scNumber,g.time FROM document_extend g WHERE g.handel_type = 2 GROUP BY g.document_id) h ON b.id = h.document_id WHERE a.id = b.category_id
AND TO_DAYS(${type}.time) > TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(${type}.time) < TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
AND ( a.parent_id = #{mainId} or a.id = #{mainId} )
AND a.id = #{classId}
ORDER BY ${type}.ckNumber desc
ORDER BY ${type}.xzNumber desc
ORDER BY ${type}.scNumber desc
SELECT id,name,parent_id FROM t_classification where parent_id = #{id}

SELECT SUM(1) y,file_type name,file_type drilldown FROM document_info a,t_classification b WHERE a.category_id = b.id AND a.audit_status = 2
AND ( b.parent_id = #{mainId} or b.id = #{mainId} )
AND b.id = #{classId}
GROUP BY file_type

SELECT a.file_name file_name,a.upload_user_name userName,c.`name` typeName,SUM(1) nowTotal FROM document_info a,document_readdocument_extend b,t_classification c WHERE a.id = b.document_id AND a.category_id = c.id AND a.audit_status = 2 AND handel_type = 2 AND handel_type = 1
AND TO_DAYS(b.time) > TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(b.time) < TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
AND ( c.name = #{pointName} or c.id in (select id from t_classification where parent_id = (select id from t_classification where name = #{pointName})) )
GROUP BY a.file_name ORDER BY nowTotal DESC

SELECT c.user_name name,count(1) y,a.user_id drilldown FROM document_info a,t_classification b,t_user c WHERE a.category_id = b.id and a.user_id = c.user_id AND a.audit_status = 2
AND ( b.parent_id = #{mainId} or b.id = #{mainId} )
AND b.id = #{classId}
AND TO_DAYS(a.create_time) > TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(a.create_time) < TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
AND c.user_name like '%${userName}%'
GROUP BY a.user_id order by y DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT d.user_name name,COUNT(1) y,a.user_id drilldown FROM document_readdocument_extend a,document_info b,t_classification c,t_user d WHERE a.document_id = b.id AND b.category_id = c.id AND a.user_id = d.user_id AND handel_type = 2 AND handel_type = 1
AND ( c.parent_id = #{mainId} or c.id = #{mainId} )
AND c.id = #{classId}
AND TO_DAYS(a.time) > TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(a.time) < TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
AND d.user_name like '%${userName}%'
GROUP BY a.user_id order by y DESC LIMIT 20

SELECT a.file_name file_name,a.upload_user_name userName,c.`name` typeName,b.time time FROM document_info a,document_readdocument_extend b,t_classification c WHERE a.id = b.document_id AND a.category_id = c.id AND a.audit_status = 2 AND handel_type = 2 AND handel_type = 1
AND TO_DAYS(b.time) > TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(b.time) < TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
AND ( c.parent_id = #{mainId} or c.id = #{mainId} )
AND c.id = #{classId}
AND EXISTS(select 1 from t_user t where t.user_id = b.user_id and t.user_name like '%${userName}%')
AND b.user_id = #{userId}
ORDER BY b.time DESC

SELECT a.file_name file_name,a.upload_user_name userName,c.`name` typeName,a.create_time as time FROM document_info a,t_classification c WHERE a.category_id = c.id AND a.audit_status = 2
AND TO_DAYS(a.create_time) > TO_DAYS(#{startTime})
AND TO_DAYS(a.create_time) < TO_DAYS(#{endTime})
AND ( c.parent_id = #{mainId} or c.id = #{mainId} )
AND c.id = #{classId}
AND EXISTS(select 1 from t_user t where t.user_id = a.user_id and t.user_name like '%${userName}%')
AND a.user_id = #{userId}
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
